loans.name: John

texts.en: John used the previous loan to buy cereals to sell. He is a 33-year-old married man with five children living in a semi-permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. His dream is to educate all of his children. For nine years, he has been selling cereals. His business is profitable as he has been able to pay school fees for his children. The major challenge he faces is inadequate capital to expand his business. His dream is to have a food store. John is requesting a loan to buy rice, maize, and millet flour to sell.

loans.use: to buy rice, maize, and millet flour to sell.

loans.name: Moïse

texts.fr:
Monsieur Moïse est un pasteur salarié. Il est marié et âgé de 52 ans. Il a six enfants dont le plus âgé a 26 ans et le moins âgé a 10 ans. Tous ses enfants vont à l’école et aucune autre personne n’est en sa charge.
Il est né en République Démocratique du Congo et son niveau d’éducation est de 3 ans des études universitaires.
Il est au premier cycle de crédit.
Le crédit demandé lui permettra de payer le minerval de ses enfants.
Il n’attend aucune difficulté pouvant faire que ce prêt ne soit pas remboursé.
Pour sa famille, il a l’ambition d’assurer le bien être familial et va continuer de payer les frais scolaires de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Moïse is employed as a pastor. He is married and is 52 years old. He has six children, who range from 26 to 10 years old. All of his children go to school and there are no other people under his care. He was born in the Democratic Republic of the Congo. He has three years of university education. 

This is Moïse's first loan. He will use the loan to pay for his children's school fees. He does not expect any difficulty in being able to pay back the loan. 

For his family, he aims to ensure their well-being and to continue to pay his children's school fees.

loans.use: to pay for his children's school fees

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy thread for the production of sofa and seat covers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for motorcycle maintenance.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Eleanor

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Eleanor works hard to support her family.
She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from ready to wear clothing. Eleanor is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business.
Eleanor has been sustaining her business activities with her past 8 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Kisojo Kweterana Gropu Group

texts.en: Rose is a 37-year-old married woman with 5 children living in Kyenjojo, Uganda. She accumulated capital from farming and started a retail shop where she sells general merchandise and agricultural produce like maize and beans. She decided to set up the business after realizing that her husband alone could not meet the daily expenses of the family. Inadequate capital to meet the high demand is her major challenge, while her dream is to own a wholesale shop. She is a member of the above mentioned group where each one guarantees the other in accessing a loan. Rose intends to use the money to buy maize and beans to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans to sell.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
This is Wilma, 41, a resident of Tanza, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Rodolfo, a security guard and she is a mother to her children. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Wilma operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store, which retails groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a PHP 5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 30,000 loan. She will be using the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Wilma hopes to expand her business and dreams of having a good life and giving her children a good education to reach their dreams. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To buy grocery items, toiletries and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Jean Bosco

texts.fr:
Jean Bosco, agriculteur des pommes de terre est marié et âgé de 25 ans. Il a un enfant âgé d’une semaine. Il a deux autres personnes en sa charge.
Il est né au Rwanda et son niveau d’éducation est 6 ans de l’enseignement secondaire.
Il a débuté ses opérations avec ACB Ltd depuis 2009 et le cycle actuel lui est le premier.
Avec ce crédit, il va acheter les semences et paiera la main d’œuvre. 
Il n’attend aucune difficulté de non remboursement de ce prêt.
Pour accroitre son activité agricole, il va pratiquer l’agriculture moderne en utilisant les engrais chimiques. Il va aussi chercher les marchés partout pour vendre sa récolte.
Comme ambition, il veut devenir le fournisseur des pommes de terre dans la région, spécialement aux écoles secondaires.
Pour sa famille, il va assurer son bien être et construira une maison d’habitation.
A part d’être l’agriculteur, il est aussi soudeur.
texts.en:
Jean Bosco, a potato farmer, is 25 years old and married. He has a one week old child. He also has two other people under his care. He was born in Rwanda and has attended six years of secondary school. 

He joined ACB Ltd. in 2009, but this is actually his first loan. With this loan, he is going to buy seed and to pay for labor. He does not expect any difficulty in the repayment of this loan. 

To increase his agricultural capacity, he is going to engage in modern farming techniques and use chemical fertilizers. He is also going to seek markets everywhere to sell his crop. 

His goal is to become a potato supplier for the area, especially for secondary schools. For his family, he is going to ensure their well-being and build them a house. Besides being a farmer, he is also a welder.

loans.use: to buy seed and to pay for labor

loans.name: Yvonne

texts.fr:
Yvonne fait le commerce des tomates. Elle est célibataire âgé de 47 ans. Elle a 2 enfants dont le plus âgé a 22 ans et le moins âgé a 8 ans. Tous ses enfants vont à l’école et a quatre autres personnes en sa charge. Elle est née au Rwanda et son niveau d’éducation est deux ans de l’enseignement secondaire.
Elle a adhéré à ACB Ltd en 2009 et le cycle actuel est le premier pour elle.
Avec ce crédit, elle va augmenter la quantité des tomates qu’elle vend et va assurer leur transport jusqu’à son magasin.
L’accident ou la maladie sont les seules difficultés qui peuvent faire que ce prêt ne soit pas bien remboursé. Elle a une stratégie d’augmenter le capital injecté dans son business, et cela assurera la croissance de son affaire. 
Son ambition pour le commerce est de devenir une grande commerçante dans sa région. La diversification des produits qu’elle vend va la permettre d’atteindre cette ambition.
Pour sa famille, elle va construire une maison moderne et va continuer la scolarisation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Yvonne sells tomatoes for a living. She is single and is 47 years old. She has two children, who are 22 and 8 years old. Both of her children go to school, and she has four other people under her care. She was born in Rwanda and has completed two years of secondary school. 

She joined ACB Ltd. in 2009, but this is actually her first loan. With this loan, she is going to increase the amount of tomatoes that she sells and pay for their delivery to her shop. 

An accident or sickness are the only difficulties that may prevent her from repaying the loan. She has a strategy to increase her business capital, and this will help her business grow. Her goal at the start is to become a important merchant in her area. The diversification of products that she sells will allow her to achieve this goal. 

For her family, she is going to build a modern house and continue to pay for her children's schooling.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes to resell and to pay for transport costs

loans.name: Yuldosh

texts.ru:
Юлдош житель района Хуросон. Ему 47 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро маленьких детей. Юлдош очень трудолюбивый и ответственный человек. Он занимается животноводством. Юлдош разводит крупнорогатый скот у себя дома. Кроме того он предоставляет услугу, он тракторист. Также Юлдош зарабатывает строительными работами по найму. В этой области он имеет богатый опыт.
Юлдош берет кредит для закупа шесть голов крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en:
Yuldosh is a resident of the Khuroson region.  He is 47 years old, married, and has five young children.  He is a very hardworking and responsible man.  He is in the business of animal husbandry.  Yuldosh breeds large, horned cattle at his home.  Besides this, he is a tractor driver and offers this service.  Yuldosh also earns money by doing building work for hire.  He has a great deal of experience in this field.

Yuldosh is taking out a loan for the purchase of six head of large, horned cattle.

loans.use: to buy six bull calves

loans.name: Nazira

texts.ru: Назире 34 годa, замужем, воспитывает двух дочек 3 детей. В поисках источника пропитания для семьи, в 2010 году Назира начала свой бизнес в животноводстве и полеводстве со стартовой суммой 20,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Назиры, на сегодня ее хозяйство приносит около 5,000 сом (KGS)- 8,000 сом (KGS)  в месяц от продажи молочных и мясных продуктов, полеводство приносит около 100,000 KGS  по сезону. Для дальнейшего расширения своего бизнеса, Назира обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку кормов для домашней скотины и на приобретение запасов зерна для посева в весенний период. в этом году она собирается сажать сахарную свеклу, овощи.  Доходы Назира планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства.
texts.en:
Nazira is 34 years old, married, and is raising three childre, two of whom are little girls.  In search of a way to provide for her family, in 2010 Nazira began her business in animal husbandry and farming with a starting sum of 20,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her persistent work, today Nazira's business brings her about 5,000 to 8,000 som per month from the sale of meat and dairy products.  Her farming brings in about 100,000 som per season.  

To further expand her business, Nazira applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 100,000 som to buy feed for her domestic cattle, and to buy seed for sewing in the spring.   This year she is preparing to plant sugar beets and vegetables.  Nazira plans to invest the income in further expanding her business.

loans.use: To purchase grass for cattle and purchase seeds for spring works

loans.name: Laura

texts.ru: Лаура 37 лет. Лаура родила и воспитала 3 детей. Старший сын помогает по хозяйству. Заёмщик имеет средне - специальное образование. После окончаний школы вышла замуж.Бизнесом занимается давно, около 9 лет назад начала заниматься животноводством и полеводством. Начала она свой бизнес с 15,000 KGS. В данный момент семья продолжает заниматься полеводством и животноводством, у них есть 2 коровы, 20 овец. Источником дохода Лаура является реализация молока с дома оптовым покупателям.Ежемесячный доход семьи составляет около 5,000 KGS. По характеру Лаура очень активный и трудолюбивый человек. Лаура обратилась в Компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) для приобретения скота.Она планирует купить  2 коровы. В будущем Лаура собирается увеличить поголовье скота и улучшить материальное положение семьи и сделать дома ремонт, обучить детей.
texts.en:
Laura is 37 years old and she bore and raised three children.  Her oldest son helps with the business.  She has a secondary/vocational education.  She married after finishing school.  She has been in business for a long time.  About nine years ago she started in the businesses of animal husbandry and farming with 15,000 KGS.  At the present time, her family continues to be in these businesses.  They have two cows and 20 sheep.  Laura's income comes from selling milk out of her home to wholesale buyers.  The family's monthly income comes to about 5,000 KGS.  By nature, she is a very active and hardworking person.  

Laura applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 100,000 KGS for the purchase of cattle. She plans to buy two cows.  In the future, Laura plans to increase her herd's size and to improve her family's matierial situation by repairing her home and educating her children.

loans.use: to purchase milk cows

loans.name: Ainagul

texts.ru: Айнагул 50 лет, замужем, имеет 2 детей. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Айнагул занимается животноводством и полеводством.Животноводством начала заниматься 10 лет назад с 20,000 KGS, полеводством начала заниматься после развала СССР, развалились и коллективные хозяйства, и каждый получил свой участок земли. На сегодняшний день Айнагуль имеет 1 корову и 10 овец, обрабатывают 2,5 га земли где ежегодно выращивают фасоль.    Хозяйство на сегодня приносит около 5,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айнагул обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 1 дойное коровы. Доходы Айнагул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота, а будущем – накопить деньги на ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Ainagul is 50 years old, married, and has two children.  As a source of income for her family, Ainagul is in the animal husbandry and farming businesses.  She began the animal husbandry business 10 years ago with 20,000 KGS.  She began farming after the collapse of the USSR, when the collective farms fell apart and everyone was given their own piece of land.  Today, Ainagul has one cow and 10 sheep.  She works 2.5 hectares of land where she grows beans every year.  Today, her businesses bring in about 5,000 som (KGS) per month.  

With the goal of further developing her business, Ainagul applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 40,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of one milk cow.  Ainagul plans to invest the income in further increasing the size of her herd, and to eventually save up money for a home remodel.

loans.use: to purchase 1 milk cow

loans.name: Copaboka 4 Group

texts.fr:
Vénuste, agriculteur du riz et membre du groupe solidaire COPABOKA 4 est marié et âgé de 44 ans. Il a cinq enfants dont le plus âgé a 17 ans et le moins âgé a  5 ans. Trois de ses enfants vont à l’école et aucune autre personne n’est en sa charge.
Il est né au Rwanda et son niveau d’éducation est 6 ans de l’école primaire.
Il a commencé de collaborer avec ACB Ltd en 2012 et le cycle actuel lui est le 2ème. Le premier cycle est bien remboursé.
Avec ce crédit, il va acheter les engrais chimiques et paiera la main d’œuvre.
Il n’attend aucune difficulté de non remboursement de ce prêt.
Comme stratégie, il va demander d’autres prêts, ceci lui permettra d’accroitre son activité agricole.
Il a l’ambition d’être le cultivateur du riz professionnel.
Pour sa famille, il a l’ambition d’éduquer ses enfants et de payer la mutuelle de santé pour assurer pleinement les soins médicaux de sa famille.
texts.en:
Vénuste is a rice farmer and a member of the COPABOKA 4 solidarity group.  He is 44 years old, married, and has five children aged between 5 and 17.  Three of his children are in school and he does not have any additional dependents.  Vénuste was born in Rwanda and he attended primary school for six years.  He started working with ACB Ltd in 2012 and is currently on his second loan cycle.  His first loan was repaid in full and on time.

Vénuste plans to use this loan to buy chemical fertilizers and to pay workers.  He does not foresee any difficulty in repaying his loan.  His plan is to request additional loans in the future so that he can further develop his farming business.  He aims to become a professional rice farmer.  As regards his family, he plans to educate his children and take out a mutual health insurance policy so that he can adequately meet his family's medical needs.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers and pay workers

loans.name: Atyrgul

texts.ru: Атыргул 44 лет, замужем у них с мужем 2 детей. Атыргул с 2001 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы в 12,000 сом (KGS), было закуплено 5 овец.  Благодаря упорному труду Атыргул - на сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве находится 2 коровы, 7 овец, 1 теленок и 3 козы, что приносит примерно 17,000 сом (KGS) в месяц с продажи молока и молочных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Атыргул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец и коров. Доходы от кредита Атыргул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства и вкладывать в образование детей.
texts.en:
Atyrgul is 44 years old, married, and has two children.  Since 2001, Atyrgul has been in the animal husbandry business, having started with 12,000 som (KGS), with which she bought five sheep.  Thanks to her persistent work, today Atyrgul has 2 cows, seven sheep, a calf, and three goats, which bring in about 17,000 som (KGS) from the sale of milk and dairy products.  

With the goal of further developing her business, Atyrgul applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 120,000 som (KGS) to buy sheep and cows.  Atyrgul plans to invest the income from the loan in further expanding her business and in her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase cows and sheep

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Burhoniddin

texts.ru: Бурхониддин проживает в городе Вахдат. Ему 27 лет. Он женат. У него один ребенок. Бурхонидин уже четыре года как предоставляет услугу. Он работает таксистом. Бурхонидин очень дружелюбный молодой человек. Он берет кредит для приобретения запчастей, чтобы продолжить работу.
texts.en: Burhoniddin lives in the city of Vahdat.  He is 27 years old, married, and has one young child.  Burhoniddin has been a taxi driver for four years already.  Burhoniddin is a very friendly young man.  He is taking out a loan for the purchase of spare parts so he can continue to work.

loans.use: to buy spare parts

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 46 years old and married with three children.  His spouse runs a retail business which helps in producing some additional income.  Peter runs a workshop in Marigat town.  He has been in business for the last ten years and his monthly income from the business is KES 50,000.
 
He has borrowed a third loan of KES 70,000, which he intends to use to purchase more timber and other materials for his workshop. 

He plans to use the additional income to plough back into the business, as well as to build a show room for furniture that he makes.  He will also save some for the education of his children.

loans.use: To purchase carpentery materials

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
This is Elizabeth and she previously accessed a 10,000 PHP loan that she used to buy spare parts, accessories and for the maintenance of their tricycle unit.  Her earnings were a big help in their personal, house hold and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 10,000 PHP loan for her to buy spare parts and for the maintenance of their tricycle unit.  Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain their daily needs.  She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Elizabeth dreams to become rich.  She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for spare parts and maintenance of her tricycle

loans.name: Copaboka 3 Group

texts.fr:
Marie, cultivatrice du riz, fait partie du groupe COPABOKA 3. Ell est âgée de 51 ans, mariée et a 5 enfants dont le plus âgé a 32 ans et le moins âgé a 13 ans. Trois de ses trois enfants vont à l'école et aucune personne n'est en sa charge. Son niveau d'éducation est 6 ans de l'école primaire.

Elle a commencé de travailler avec ACB en 2012, et le cycle actuel est le deuxième pour elle. Avec le crédit lui octroyé, elle va acheter les engrais chimiques et paiera la main d’œuvre. Elle n’attend aucune difficulté de non remboursement.  Pour accroître son agriculture, elle prévoit utiliser la stratégie d’utiliser les bonnes semences du riz. Elle a une double ambition, l’une pour sa famille et l’autre pour son activité agricole.
Pour son activité agricole, elle va faire son mieux pour devenir la grande cultivatrice du riz.
Pour sa famille, elle va éduquer ses enfants et luttera contre la malnutrition dans sa famille.
texts.en:
Marie is a rice farmer and a member of the COPABOKA 3 group.  She is 51 years old, married, and has five children.  Her eldest child is 32 years old and her youngest is 13.  Thee of her children attend school and she has no additional dependents.  Marie herself attended primary school for six years.

Marie started working with ACB in 2012 and is currently on her second loan cycle.  With this loan, she plans to buy chemical fertilizers and pay workers.  She does not foresee any difficulties in meeting her repayments.  In order to further develop her farming business, she plans to use the strategy of planting good rice seed.  She has two goals: one for her family and the other for her farming business.  Her goal for her farming is to do her best and become an important rice farmer.  Her goal for her family is to educate her children and fight malnutrition within her family.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers and to pay workers

loans.name: Kadia

texts.fr:
Agée de 45 ans, mariée et mère de 4 enfants Kadia vit  avec son mari dans  la ville de Koutiala. 
Kadia n’as pas eu la chance de faire des études,  raison pour la quelle elle s’est intéressée aux activités génératrices  de revenus depuis à bas âge. Après avoir mené plusieurs activités commerciales actuellement elle opta pour l’achat vente d’habillements tels pagnes wax.  Pour augmenter son fonds de commerce afin d’élargir son activité, Kadia a fait recours  à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso depuis  8 ans.   Elle a pris des prêts dans l’association (prêt solidaire) tous  remboursés correctement  et elle est à son 11eme  prêt en individuel, dont les précédents ont été bien remboursés. Avec ce financement, elle compte acheter, 60 pièces  de pagnes wax en provenance de Lomé (Togo). Elle  effectue sa vente à domicile  à une clientèle constituée de femmes en général, au comptant et souvent à crédit. 
Avec ce financement, elle compte sur un bénéfice mensuel de 75.000FCFA, qu’elle envisage utiliser pour le  remboursement des taux d’intérêts de Soro, contribuer à l’amélioration de la  condition de vie de sa famille et investir le reste dans son activité.
texts.en:
Kadia is 45 years old, married, and has four children.  She lives with her husband in the town of Koutiala.

Kadia was unable to attend school and so became interested in money-making activities at a young age.  After having run a number of different commercial businesses, she now sells clothing such as wax pagnes (traditional wraparound fabrics).  In order to increase her working capital and expand her business, Kadia has been working with Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution for 8 years.  She has taken out group loans with the association (which were all repaid correctly) and is now on her 11th individual loan (all her previous individual loans having been correctly repaid as well).

Kadia plans to use this loan to buy 60 pagnes from Lomé (Togo).  She sells her products from home to a customer base made up primarily of women.  Her customers pay both in cash and on credit.  With this loan, Kadia will make a monthly profit of 75,000 francs which she plans to use to pay the interest charged by Soro Yiriwaso and contribute towards improving her family's living conditions.  She will invest the rest in her business.

loans.use: to buy wax pagnes

loans.name: Nouffo

texts.fr: Nouffo est une femme âgée de 58ans. Elle a comme conjoint un retraité et ils ont 02enfants. Elle est revendeuse de produits d’alimentation générale depuis 1995. Son activité qu’elle exerce lui permet d’aider son mari dans les charges du foyer. Afin de répondre aux besoins de ses nombreux clients, elle fait un second crédit à WAGES pour acheter des produits alimentaires. Comme perspectives d’avenir, Nouffo veut ouvrir une autre boutique et avoir une bonne condition de vie.
texts.en: Nouffo is 58 years old.  Her husband is retired and she has two children.  Nouffo has been selling basic food products since 1995.  Her business allows her to help her husband cover their household expenses.  In order to meet the needs of her large customer base, Nouffo is taking out a second loan from WAGES to buy more food products.  In the future, she would like to open another shop and enjoy a better lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy food products

loans.name: Kansenene Group

texts.en:
John is a member of Kansenene United Traders where each member guarantees the others in accessing loans.  He intends to use a loan to purchase fresh food such as Irish and sweet potatoes to sell.  

He lives in Fort Portal Uganda and is married with eight children and like all good fathers he desires to see them graduate since he never got a chance to go to school due to his parents inability to meet the expenses.  He has been dealing in fresh foods for two years and has already grown his profits.  He started by hawking but has a market store now and his desire is to have at least five stalls .

loans.use: Purchase fresh produce for sale.

loans.name: Marry Ann

texts.en:
Marry Ann works hard to support her family.  Marry Ann is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Marry Ann requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell like soap, shampoo, can goods, noodles, etc.  Marry Ann has been in this business for 8 years now.  In the future, Marry Ann would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks to sell like soap, shampoo, can goods, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Abdalla

texts.en:
Abdalla is a resident of Malindi area of Coast province, Kenya.  He is a married business man.  Abdalla owns a retail shop, a business that he has been running for three year.  Abdalla began the business through the savings he made from casual jobs.  In this shop, he sells paraffin, sugar, flour etc.  He is also employed.

He learnt about Milango from other clients and joined the institution with an aim of accessing credit to improve the operations of his business. The main challenge is high competition and price fluctuations.   Abdalla is applying for a loan of 26,300 Kenya shillings to purchase paraffin, sugar, flour, and other non perishables for sale.  The extra income from the loan will be added to his savings to improve on his living standard.  He aspires to own other centers and plan for his children’s education with more security.

loans.use: To purchase paraffin, sugar, flour, and other non perishables for sale.

loans.name: Kondalo

texts.fr: Âgée de 29ans, Kondalo vit avec son conjoint cuisinier et leurs deux enfants à Lomé. Âgés de 5 et 1an, le premier seul va à l’école. Quand à Kondalo elle est revendeuse. Elle vend de la nourriture dans une boutique et est aidée par 04 personnes. Afin d’acheter en quantité considérable les denrées alimentaires dont elle aura besoin pour sa restauration, elle fait un second crédit à WAGES. Avec le profit, elle veut créer une autre boutique et assurer le bien –être de la famille.
texts.en:
Kondalo is 29 years old.  She lives with her husband, who is a chef, and their two children, in Lomé.   Her children are 5 years old and 1 year old.  The eldest attends school.

Kondalo sells food from a shop.  She is helped by four other people.  In order to buy a large quantity of ingredients which she needs to make the food that she sells, she is requesting a second loan from WAGES.  She plans to use her profits to start another shop and ensure the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to buy food products

loans.name: Mikoadomé

texts.fr: Mr mikoadomé vit avec sa femme coiffeuse et leurs enfants à Lomé. Il est plombier et revendeur à la fois. Il vend du ciment, des matériels de quincailleries dans une boutique et est aidé par 01 personne.  Cette activité qu’il mène depuis 2010 lui permet de se prendre en charge et d’assurer les besoins vitaux de la famille. Dans le souci de répondre favorablement aux besoins des clients, il fait un prêt à WAGES pour acheter de tonnes de ciment et des matériels de quincailleries. Avec les profits, il veut terminer son chantier, ouvrir une boutique annexe et améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille.
texts.en: Mikoadomé lives with his wife, who is a hairdresser, and their children, in Lomé.  He works as both a plumber and a re-seller.  He sells cement and hardware products in a shop and is helped by one other person.  Mikoadomé has been in this business since 2010 and it allows him to provide for his family's basic needs.  In order to be able to respond opportunely to his customers' needs, Mikoadomé is taking out a loan from WAGES to buy cement by the ton and also hardware products.  He would like to use his profits to finish his construction work, open another store adjacent to the current one and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cement and hardware products

loans.name: Jesca

texts.en:
Jesca is a 39 year old government employee who works as a copy typist.  A mother to two children who is divorced and lives in Kagadi Uganda.  She owns a bar to supplement her salary.  She dreams of starting up a bigger business that will enable her to look after her children as a single mother. 

Jesca is requesting for a loan to buy beer to sell.

loans.use: to buy beer to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a variety of fish to resell

loans.name: Jennylen

texts.en:
As a married parent of 2 children, Jennylen works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from direct selling of personal collections.  Jennylen is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, can goods, eggs, spices, etc. for her general store business.

Jennylen has been sustaining her business activities through her past 9 loans from NWTF.  She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, can goods, eggs, spices, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To  purchase paraffin, sugar, flour, vegetables etc for sale.

loans.name: Rajabali

texts.ru:
Рачабали мужчина в возрасте 39 лет. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Его жена домохозяйка, занимается воспитанием детей а также продажей молока. У них очень дружная семья. Рачабали с женой очень стараются чтобы их дети не нуждались не в чем.
 Рачабали занимается животноводством, откармливает скот у себя дома. Также он занимается выращиванием зерновых культур и он работает председателем деканского хозяйство. Так как у него заработной платы не хватает на жизнь он вынужден заниматься животноводством. Рачабали дома имеет несколько голов скота и дойную корову которая каждый день дает 10 литров молока. Его жена продает соседям молоко. От откармливания скота они получают очень хорошую прибыл, поэтому они стараются развивать свой бизнес . 
  На полученный кредит Рачабали хочет купить скот и увеличить поголовье скота. Заранее благодарит организацию Кива за помощь и поддержку.
texts.en:
Rajabali is a 39 year old man.  He is married and has three children.  His wife is a homemaker, takes care of their children, and sells milk.  They have a very happy family.  Rajabali and his wife try very hard to give their children everything they need. 

Rajabali is in the animal husbandry business.  He fattens cattle at their home.  He also grows grain crops and is the chairman of the farmers' association.  Since his salary isn't enough for living, he is forced to be in the animal husbandry business.  Rajabali has several head of cattle and a milk cow, which gives 10 liters of milk every day.  His wife sells the milk to their neighbors.  He makes a very good profit from fattening cattle, and so they are trying to develop this business.  

Rajabali wants to buy cattle with the loan and to increase the size of his herd.  He thanks Kiva in advance for its help and support.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Asira

texts.en: Asira is a forty-five-year-old married woman with seven children living in Kasese, Uganda. Twenty-three years ago she decided to venture into farming and she mainly grows maize in order to raise school fees for her children. She also has a piggery project to earn extra income. Price fluctuations and inadequate capital pose a challenge to her business growth, while her dream is to buy land and do commercial farming. Asira intends to use the loan to  pay workers who are to help her harvest her maize garden.

loans.use: to pay workers who are to help her harvest her maize garden.

loans.name: Tchotcho

texts.fr: Après sa formation en couture, tchotcho a ouvert son atelier en 2000. Elle est âgée de 39ans et emploie 02 personnes. En plus de son activité, elle vend du crédit et du pure water(eau minérale en sachet). Pour l’avancement de son activité, elle sollicite un prêt auprès de WAGES pour acheter de la machine à coudre, du crédit et de l’eau minérale en sachet. Elle voudrait épargner son profit, ouvrir une boutique et avoir une bonne condition de vie.
texts.en: After her training as a dressmaker, Tchotcho opened her workshop in 2000. She is 39 years old and employs two people. On top of her business, she sells credit and "pure water" (mineral water in sachets). In order to develop her business she is requesting a loan from WAGES to buy sewing machines, credit and sachets of mineral water. She would like to save her profits, open a shop and enjoy good living conditions.

loans.use: to buy sewing machines, credit and pure water.

loans.name: Kokoé

texts.fr: Kokoe est revendeuse de prêt à porter au marché.  Elle et son mari qui  est comptable gestionnaire n’ont pas encore d’enfant. Agée de 38 ans, elle a de grandes ambitions pour son activité. Elle sollicite son premier crédit auprès de WAGES pour l’achat  des tenues  prêt à porter. Elle prévoit réinvestir ses profits supplémentaires dans son activité afin que celle-ci puisse rapporter assez de recettes pour satisfaire les besoins de la famille.
texts.en: Kokoe retails ready-to-wear clothing in the market. She and her husband, who is an accounts manager, do not yet have any children. She is 38 years old and has big ambitions for her business. She is requesting her first loan from WAGES so that she can buy ready-to-wear outfits. She plans to reinvest her profits into her business so that she can make enough income to meet the family's needs.

loans.use: to buy ready-to-wear clothing.

loans.name: Khudoyberdy

texts.ru: Худойберди 42 года. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 5 детей. Его жена Бибирачаб, работает в фермерском хозяйстве. Дети еще не совершеннолетние и они учатся в средней школе. Худойберди очень заботливый отец и всегда старается делать все лучшее для семьи. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 9 лет назад он начал свой бизнес транспортировкой. У него есть свой грузовик, и он перевозит разные товары и грузы, местных жителей. Он продает свой товар на местном рынке и имеет большой круг клиентов. Он имеет дополнительный доход от купли продажи фруктов и овощей. Худойберди должен упорно работать для обеспечения большой семьи. Дети растут и требуют все больше благ. Он старается развевать бизнес, то есть привлечь больше клиентов, но его грузовик в плохом состоянии и он должен отремонтировать свой грузовик. Худойберди не имеет денег для ремонта грузовика. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 2500 сомони  для ремонта грузовика. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Khudoyberdy is 42 years old, married, and is raising five children.  His wife, Bibirachab, works in farming.  The children are still minors and are in high school.  Khudoyberdy is a very caring father and always tries to do the best for his family.  With the goal of providing his family with all the necesssities, nine years ago he started his own transportation business.  He has his own lorry and he transports various merchandise, freight, and local residents.  He offers his service at the local market and has a large client base.  He earns an additional income from trading in fruits and vegetables.  

Khudoyberdy has to work hard to provide for his big family.  The children are growing and they need more and more material goods.  Khudoyberdy is trying to develop his business by attracting more clients but his lorry is in bad shape and needs repairs, but he doesn't have the money for this.  He is requesting a loan of 2,500 somoni for repairing the lorry.  He is depending on your kindness.

loans.use: to repair his lorry

loans.name: Lalagnédou

texts.fr: Mère de 02 enfants  tous scolarisés et âgés respectivement de 10 et 06 ans,  Lalagnédou est mariée à un revendeur d’Habits. Elle est âgée de 31 ans et pratique le commerce de  plats en verres, des micro-ondes et autres ustensiles dans sa boutique depuis 2009. Elle sollicite son premier crédit auprès de WAGES pour acheter de la marchandise. Elle désire augmenter ses revenus et réinvestir les profits supplémentaires dans son commerce. Elle veut ainsi aider son mari dans la scolarisation des enfants, mais  également avoir un second lieu de vente.
texts.en: Lalagnédou is mother to two children, who are ten and six years old respectively and both at school. She is married to a clothing retailer and is 31 years old. She has been selling glass dishes, microwave ovens and other kitchen equipment in her shop since 2009. She is requesting her first loan from WAGES to buy goods. She wants to increase her income and reinvest the profits in her business, so that she can help her husband to pay for the children's education and at the same time have a second sales outlet.

loans.use: to buy plates, glasses and other items.

loans.name: Maka

texts.en:
Maka is 34 years old and lives with her husband, three children and mother-in-law in the Martvili district, Georgia. Her mother-in-law receives a retirement pension while the family runs an agricultural business. Specifically, they have three milk cows, whose milk is used in cheese production. Maka milks cows and produces cheese, which she sells locally in an open market at a good price. The family also has a pig and sells piglets locally. In addition, they own agricultural land, where they grow 350 nut trees. 

Maka is a very hard working woman with a lot of experience in her business. She has requested a loan to purchase another milk cow. With the additional  cow, she will be able to produce more dairy products to sell. This will increase the income of the family and improve their living conditions. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy a milk cow

loans.name: Yawavi

texts.fr: Demeurant avec son mari et ses 03 enfants, Yawavi est propriétaire d’une boutique d’alimentation générale. Deux de ses enfants sont scolarisés. Elle a débuté son commerce en 2010 et n’emploie encore personne pour l’assister. Elle sollicite son second prêt auprès de WAGES pour payer des produits d’alimentation générale. Elle veut utiliser ses profits pour s’occuper de sa famille. Elle désire avoir un chiffre d’affaire  plus conséquent et une famille épanouie.
texts.en: Yawavi, who lives with her husband and three children, owns a grocery store. Two of her chldren are at school. She began her business in 2010 and does not yet employ anyone else to help her. She is requesting a second loan from WAGES to pay for groceries. She wants to use her profits to take care of her family. She would like to have a more significant turnover and see her family thrive.

loans.use: to buy general grocery products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for maintenance of the motorcycle.

loans.name: Karisa

texts.en:
Karisa lives in the Kongowea area of Coast province, Kenya. He is a married father of two children. He owns a retail shop, a business which he has been operating for two years. In this shop, Karisa sells charcoal. Besides this, he also keeps indigenous animals and sells them, managing the trade of buying and selling of the same animals. He is also an event organizer, owning public address and music systems that are often hired for functions.

He learnt about Milango through a friend with an aim of accessing credit to improve the business operations. The challenge he is facing is bad debts. Karisa is applying for a loan of 93,850 Kenya shillings to buy other local animals and also increase the stock of charcoal in his shop. The extra income from the loan will be added to his savings to improve the living standards of his family. His aspiration is to open a butchery.

loans.use: To buy local animals and also increase the stock of charcoal in his shop.

loans.name: Maimouna

texts.fr: Veuve en charge de 03 enfants dont 01 scolarisé,  Maïmouna est revendeuse de céréales dans un marché de la ville de Lomé.  Elle a débuté cette activité qui constitue sa principale source de revenu en l’an  2000. Elle sollicite son premier prêt auprès de WAGES pour stocker des céréales pour la période de soudure. Elle compte créer une nouvelle source de revenu avec son profit mais également désire renforcer son activité et assurer la santé de ses enfants.
texts.en: Maïmouna is a widow with three children in her care, one of whom is at school. She retails cereals in a market in Lomé. She began this activity, which constitutes her main source of income, in 2000. She is requesting her first loan from WAGES to stock cereals for the lean season. She is planning to create a new source of income with the profits she makes, but at the same time wants to boost her activity and ensure her children's good health.

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Assana

texts.fr: Assana est revendeuse de produits alimentaires de premières nécessités au marché. Âgée de 29 ans, elle est mère d’un enfant non scolarisé. Elle a débuté son activité en 2008 et sollicite son premier crédit auprès de WAGES pour l’achat des produits alimentaires afin de renforcer son commerce. Elle compte réinvestir ses profits supplémentaires dans son activité et souhaite assurer l’épanouissement de sa famille.
texts.en: Assana retails basic food products in the market. She is 29 years old and mother to a child who does not go to school. She began her activity in 2008 and is requesting her first loan from WAGES to buy food products so that she can strengthen her business. She is planning to reinvest her profits in the business and would like to ensure that her family thrives.

loans.use: to buy general grocery products.

loans.name: Affi

texts.fr: Mère de 02 enfants, Affi est une dame âgée de 43 ans. Ses enfants sont respectivement âgés de 15 et 09 ans. Elle a démarré son commerce de produits de beauté au marché de N’kafu depuis plus de 22 ans. Elle sollicite son second prêt auprès de WAGES pour acheter de nouvelle gamme de produits de beauté. Elle désire ouvrir sa boutique plus tard et mieux pourvoir aux besoins alimentaires de sa famille.
texts.en: Affi is 43 years old and mother to two children. Her children are 15 and nine years old respectively. She began her beauty products business in the market at N'kafu more than 22 years ago. She is requesting her second loan from WAGES so that she can buy a new range of beauty products. She would like to open her own shop later on and to be able to provide for her family's food.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Mirzosaid

texts.ru: Мирзосаиду 52 года. Он женат на прекрасной женщине, которая является пенсионеркой и получает маленькую пенсию. Мирзосаид имеет 3 детей. Детям 18, 28 и 32 года. Он очень любит своих детей и всегда старается обеспечить их со всеми не обходимыми средствами. Мирзосаид окончил в 1976 году Профессиональное Техническое Учреждение по специальности сантехника. Более 35 лет он работает сантехником в разных учреждениях. Данное время он работает в заводе переработки хлопка. Так как он очень трудолюбивый и добрый человек, его коллеги очень уважают его. Мирзосаид планирует женить своего младшего сына, но не имеет денег для проведения свадебного мероприятия. Его сын очень просит не отложить свадьбу, и поэтому Мирзосаид обратился за займом в сумме 2500 сомони для проведения свадебного мероприятия своего сына. Мирзосаид и его сын ждут вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Mirzosaid is 52 years old.  He is married to a wonderful woman who is retired and receiving a small pension.  Mirzosaid has three children:  18, 28, and 32 years old.  He loves his children very much and always tries to provide them with all the necessities.  In 1976 Mirzosaid graduated from the Professional Technical Institute as a plumber.  He has worked for more than 35 years as a plumber in various establishments.  At the present time, he works in a cotton processing factory.  Since he is a very hard working and decent man, he is well respected by his colleagues.  

Mirzosaid is planning to marry off his youngest son, but he doesn't have the money for the wedding party.  His son is begging to not put off the wedding, and because of this Mirzosaid applied for a loan of 2,500 somoni for his son's wedding party.  Mirzosaid and his son are depending on your kindness.

loans.use: to make his son’s wedding party

loans.name: Margarit

texts.en: Margarit is involved in agriculture. She runs a farm where she cultivates land and keeps livestock. Her farm currently includes 2 oxen and 2 cows.  She lives in Beniamin village in the Shirak region with her two sons. They live in an old house which needs to be repaired. Margarit has applied for this loan to purchase potato seeds. The stable growth of agriculture is important for the family to make savings, renovate the house and live in better conditions.

loans.use: to pay for potato seeds.

loans.name: Tamar

texts.en: Tamar is 42 years old. She lives with her husband and daughter in Tskaltubo district, West Georgia. The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have 2 milk cows whose milk is used in cheese production. They sell cheese locally in an open market at a good price. Her husband trades vegetables locally. Tamar is a very hardworking woman and has a rich experience in her business. Tamar requested a loan to purchase 2 milk cows. After purchasing these additional cows, she will be able to produce more cheese to sell locally. This will increase the income of the family. With increased income, they will improve their living conditions. Tamar awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase 2 milk cows.

loans.name: Kristine

texts.en:
Kristine is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 30,000 PHP through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business for her food vending business.

Kristine has been in this business for 10 years. Kristine earns additional income from fishing and renting videoke machines.

Kristine has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Amylie

texts.en:
Amylie is 32 years old with one child who is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 4 years.

She requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business. In the future, Amylie would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Everlyn

texts.en:
Everlyn is a 26-year-old married woman with one child living in Masindi, Uganda. She is a teacher and has been in service for three years. Her passion to teach was instilled in her by her mother who has been in service for over thirty years. Everlyn's low salary, that can hardly meet the family's basic needs, is a major setback, while her dream is to become a school principal after upgrading her studies.

She is helping her husband to construct a residential house, and that is why she is requesting a loan to buy construction materials such as bricks and sand.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as bricks and sand.

loans.name: Cristine

texts.en:
Cristine is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 2 years. She earns more income from salted egg making and raising pigs.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell, like soap, noodles, canned goods, soft drinks, etc. for her general store business. She hopes to repair and renovate her family home in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell, like soap, noodles, canned goods, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Betty

texts.en: Betty is a 48-year-old married woman with two children living in Masindi, Uganda. She operates a bar business and with the income earned she has been able to pay school fees for her children. Her business is within the major market place of the town thus has many customers. Bottle breakages due to drunken customers and inadequate capital to meet the demand pose great challenges, but her dream is to own a modern bar in town. Betty intends to use the loan to buy beers and sodas to sell after the Christmas season.

loans.use: to buy beers and sodas to sell after the Christmas season.

loans.name: Jackline

texts.en:
Jackline is a resident of Changamwe of Coast province, Kenya. She is married and has three children. Jackline owns a retail shop, a business that she has been in operating for six years. She obtained money from the savings she had made while at a women's group within her area and set up the business. She is also employed as a teacher.

She learned about Milango through an employee with an aim of accessing credit to improve the operations of her business. Her main challenges are inflation and the seasonal business climate. She is applying for a loan of 85,900 Kenya shillings to purchase a new stock of tea leaves, etc. The extra income from the loan will be added to her savings to improve the living standard of the family. Jackline aspires to own a large wholesale shop in the future.

loans.use: To purchase a new stock of tea leaves, etc.

loans.name: Rabietou

texts.fr: Agée de 52 ans, Rabiétou est revendeuse de céréales  depuis  1980. Elle est mariée et mère de 05 enfants dont 01 scolarisé. Elle pratique  son activité à son domicile et au marché.  Elle sollicite son second prêt auprès de WAGES pour acheter des stocks de céréales en vue de relever son activité qui est à cours de capital. Elle ambitionne de développer son activité et de mieux s’occuper de la santé de sa famille.
texts.en: Rabiétou is 52 years old and has been selling cereals since 1980. She is married and mother to five children, one of whom is at school. She carries out her activity from home and at the market. She is requesting her second loan from WAGES so that she can stock up on cereals and expand her activity which is low on capital. Her ambition is to develop her business and be able to take better care of her family's health.

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Seidou

texts.fr: Epouse d’un boucher, Riyalatou est mère d’un enfant de 02 ans non encore scolarisé. Elle est âgée de 29 ans et est revendeuse de trousseau bébé au marché de Hédzranawoé depuis 2001. Elle sollicite son premier prêt auprès de WAGES pour l’achat de  marchandises supplémentaires. Elle rêve d’avoir une boutique et d’assurer l’autosuffisance alimentaire de sa famille.
texts.en: Riyalatou is married to a butcher and is the mother of a 2-year-old child who doesn't yet attend school. She is 29 years old and has been selling baby outfits at the Hédzranawoé market since 2001. She is requesting her first loan from WAGES so that she can buy more merchandise. She dreams of owning her own shop and ensuring her family's food self-sufficiency.

loans.use: to buy baby outfits.

loans.name: Copaboka 2 Group

texts.fr:
Monsieur Théophile est cultivateur du riz. Il est membre du groupe solidaire COPABOKA 2. Marié et âgé de 30 ans, Monsieur Théophile a 2 enfants dont le plus âgé a 4 ans et le moins âgé a 3 ans. Aucun de ses enfants ne va à l’école et aucune autre personne est en sa charge.
Monsieur Théophile est né au Rwanda et son niveau d’éducation est 6 ans de l’école primaire.
Il a commencé de collaborer avec ACB Ltd en 2012 et actuellement est au 2ème cycle de crédit. Le premier cycle est remboursé sans aucune irrégularité.
Avec le crédit lui est octroyé, il va acheter les engrais chimiques et paiera la main d’œuvre.
N’attendant aucune difficulté de non remboursement, Monsieur Théophile va utiliser la stratégie de demander d’autres prêts pour accroitre son activité agricole. 
Il a l’ambition d’assurer l’éducation de ses enfants ainsi que les soins médicaux des membres de sa famille.
texts.en:
Théophile is a rice farmer. He is a member of the "Copaboka 2" solidarity group. A married man, 30-year-old Théophile has 2 children, the eldest of whom is 4 and the youngest, 3. Neither of his children go to school and he is responsible for no other people.

Théophile was born in Rwanda and has 6 years of primary school education. He started working with ACB Ltd in 2012 and is currently on his 2nd loan cycle. The first loan was repaid without any problem. With the loan that he is granted, he will buy chemical fertilizer and pay his labourers. He does not expect to have any trouble repaying his loans, and his strategy will be to ask for more loans so that he can grow his farming business. His aim is to provide for his children's education as well as for his family members' health care.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers and pay his labourers.

loans.name: Abduchabor

texts.ru: Абдучаббору 42 года. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Его дети не совершеннолетние. Абдучаббор является единственным кормильцем в семье.  С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 1 год назад он начал свой бизнес услугой таксиста. Он старается предоставлять хорошую услугу, так как конкуренция большая и у клиентов большой выбор на такси. Благодаря хорошему сервису у него есть свои постоянные клиенты. Последнее время его машина имеет плохое состояние и поэтому он должен отремонтировать машину. Если он не будет делать ремонт, то потеряет клиентов. Он запрашивает займ на сумму  2500 сомони для покупки ремонта машины. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Abduchabor is 42 years old. He is married and is raising two young children. Abduchabor is the sole breadwinner in the family. 

In order to provide for his family, he started his own business a year ago providing a taxi service. He is trying to provide a good service, as competition is high and customers have a big selection for a taxi. Through excellent service, he has his regular customers. Of late, his car is in poor condition and he must do repairs. If he will not do the repairs, he will lose customers. He is asking for a loan of 2,500 Somoni to pay for car repairs. He is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: To repair his car

loans.name: Burihol

texts.ru:
Бурихол очень грамотная женщина. Она мать 5 детей и учительница многочисленных учеников. Она замужем и ее муж колхозник. Они живут бедно, но счастливо, так как у них есть взаимопонимание и они поддерживают друг друга. Бурихол является учительницей средних классов и имеет большой опыт. Ее ученики очень любят и используют ее знания. Ее коллеги знают ее как трудолюбивую и добрую женщину. Она получает маленькую зарплату, доход ее мужа тоже не достаточный для содержания семьи со всеми не обходимыми средствами. Они много лет не могут отремонтировать их дом, а их дом 
не отвечает стандартам жилья. Бурихол срочно должна отремонтировать свой дом. Бурихол запрашивает займ на сумму  1500 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, песок,  краски и т.п. для ремонта дома.  Бурихол ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Burihol is a very competent woman. She is the mother of five children and a teacher of many students. She is married and her husband is a collective farmer. They live in poverty, but are happy because they have a mutual understanding and they support each other. Burihol is a middle school teacher and has quite a lot of experience. Her students love her very much and use her knowledge. Her colleagues know her as a hardworking and kind woman. 

She receives a small salary, and her husband's income is also not enough to support the family with all the necessary means. For many years, they have been unable to repair their home, which is substandard. Burihol urgently needs to repair her home. Because of the lack of amenities, the children are always cold in the winter. Burihol is requesting a loan of 1,500 Somoni to buy construction materials, such as cement, sand, paint, and the like, for home repairs. Burihol is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: To buy building materials, such as cement, paint, etc., for home repairs

loans.name: Juan Ronald

texts.es:
RONALD tiene 25 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

La VRC EL RECREO, se encuentra ubicada en el sector del recinto San Vicente las lomas, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores pecuarias y agrícolas.

RONALD se dedica a la siembra de maíz suave y arroz. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, líquidos mata monte, insecticidas, ranger. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar semilla de buena calidad y los fertilizantes necesarios para los cultivos.

Las compras lo hace en Ventanas. El sueño es tener buena salud y comprar uncarro para el trabajo. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar boli y pasear con los padres.
texts.en:
Ronald is 25 years old, single and doesn’t have any children.  He lives with his parents in Ventanas, within the Los Ríos province.

The “EL RECREO” communal bank is located in the San Vincente Las Lomas sector, which is part of the Ventanas settlement.  The people in this area are farmers and raise livestock.

Ronald raises corn and rice.  He is asking for this loan so that he can buy seeds, urea, weed killers, insecticides and other products.

With the help of this loan he will be able to buy good quality seed and fertilizer, necessary for his crops.  He makes his purchases in Ventanas.

His dream is to be healthy and buy a car for work.  He likes to play volleyball and spend time with his parents in his spare time.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies

loans.name: Norlan Antonio

texts.es:
Norlan, 30 años  de edad, originario de la Comarca Asedades, Teustepe, casado, padre de 1 hijo, con 1 año de edad, de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de hamacas. El inicio desde muy joven trabajando  con su papa, el cual le pagaba mano de obra, de esta manera  fue adquiriendo experiencia en la venta de ropa de forma ambulante, luego se caso y decidió independizarse para establecer su propio negocio, el cual lo comenzó con un dinero que tenia ahorrado, del que es propietario hace mas de 12 años, el dice que le ha ido muy bien, ya que con las ganancias que le genera su negocio ha podido comprar animales como vacas.
El esta solicitando el financiamiento para comprar hamacas, cortinas, sabana, etc. Ella  estima que este préstamo le ayudaría mucho porque asi podrá comprar la mercadería que mas se vende. Sus planes futuros es  establecer un tramo para vender productos que aun no tiene en existencia y de esta manera obtener mejores ingresos y mas clientelas, sus metas próximas es  viajar a otros departamento a vender su mercancía.
texts.en:
Norlan is 30 years old and from the Asedades, Teustepe settlement.  He’s married, has a one year old son, and is a merchant who sells hammocks.  He began working as a laborer for his father when he was very young and gained lots of experience selling clothing on foot.  He later married and decided to set up his own business with some money that he had saved up.  He’s had his business for 12 years and says that things have gone well for him and he has been able to buy cattle with his profits.

He is asking for this loan in order to buy hammocks, curtains, sheets, etc.  He estimates that this loan will be very helpful because he will be able to buy the merchandise that sells the best.  His plans for the future include setting up a shop to sell products that he doesn’t have yet.  In this way he will be able to earn more income and new customers.  His next goal is to travel to other departments to sell his merchandise.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en: Evelyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a bakery business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 24 years. She earns more income from farming sugarcane. Evelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients, like flour and other materials, for her bakery business. She hopes to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients, like flour and other materials, for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for maintenance.

loans.name: Fosca

texts.en: Fosca, 39, is a hardworking woman who has four children and lives in Kyenjojo, Uganda. Fosca started out growing crops, especially Irish potatoes, and she accumulated capital to open a beer and soda depot. Her business is located on a busy street in her town and basically targets urban clients. She has a personal goal of educating her children and a dream of constructing rental houses for more income generation. Price fluctuation and inflation leading to higher prices affect her customers.  Her business goal is to open another outlet. Fosca is requesting a loan to buy beer and sodas to sell.

loans.use: to buy beer and sodas to sell.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick, 36, is a farmer in Nkubu county in Kenya, where he lives with his wife and two children, who are both in school. He has been farming for the past fifteen years, producing bananas and cereals that he sells at the local market. He operates a retail shop as an additional source of income.

He is requesting a 30,000 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase poultry.  He will sell the products and earn extra income to improve his livelihood and pay for his children's schooling. He intends to have five thousand chickens, both layers and broilers, wihtin five years.

Lack of capital and poor markets are his major challenges in farming.

He is grateful to Juhudi Kilimo for providing him with the loan.

loans.use: to purchase poultry for his farm.

loans.name: 06.12.01 Đông Vệ Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Nga has a retail business selling dry food. She is requesting a loan to purchase dry food, such as rice, beans, corn and cassava, to resell. Nga has been involved in this business for more than ten years. The main hardship that Nga faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Nga, 43, is married and has 2 children. She is the leader of a five-member group, the 06.12.01 Đông Vệ solidarity group. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, and she has one dependent. This is Nga’s first loan from Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

With her business profit, Nga hopes that her children will find good jobs, her business will do well, and she will be able to remodel her house.

loans.use: to purchase dry food, such as rice, beans, corn and cassava, to resell.

loans.name: Martha Cecilia

texts.es: Martha con su anterior credikiva compró víveres, ranchos, refrescos y bebidas, que vendió en su tienda y con ello aumentó ligeramente su capital de trabajo y por consiguiente sus utilidades que son ingresos para su hogar. Desde que recibió su crédito, dio apertura a otro negocio y hoy son dos unidades generadoras de ingreso con las que cuenta en puntos diferentes de la ciudad.  Ella envía el siguiente mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva: "Gracias por el apoyo prestado al negocio, de esta manera se da un excelente crecimiento. " En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el cual planea comprar productos como leche, salsas, café, azúcar y otros víveres, debido a que en esta época de fin de año aumenta la demanda y por consiguiente sus ganancias.
texts.en: Martha used her previous Kiva loan to buy food products, snacks and soft drinks which she sold in her store and, as a result, she slightly increased her working capital and profits.  Since she received her loan she has opened another business and now has two income-generating businesses in different parts of the city.  She sends the following message to Kiva lenders: "Thanks to the support you have given my business, it has grown rapidly".  Martha is currently requesting a new Kiva loan with which she plans to buy products such as milk, sauces, coffee, sugar and other food products because this is a time of year when her demand, and consequently her profits, increase.

loans.use: to buy products such as milk, sauces, coffee, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Isaura

texts.es: Isaura tiene 29 años de edad, vive en el barrio La nieves de la ciudad de Barranquilla, con su cónyuge y sus dos hijas en las edades de 3 y 8 años.  Su idea de negocio nació cuando su vecina le pidió que la ayudara en la fabricación de muñecos, sabanas y cortina y allí aprendió y empezó a ser compensada;  así  inició posteriormente su propio negocio sin preparación técnica, solo aprovechando  su capacidad de ver y  llevar a la práctica lo que observaba. Su meta de negocio es más adelante adquirir un local propio, generar fuentes de empleos y el aprendizaje continuo hasta llegar al perfeccionamiento del oficio. Su meta  familiar es ofrecerle a sus hijos una educación avanzada y ayudar a su esposo cada vez más en dar respuesta a los gastos del hogar. En su negocio los productos que ofrece son muñequería, artículos de lencería, sabanas, cortinas, que vende de contado desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 5 de la tarde, compra de contado y prefiere hacerlo en mayor volumen, para obtener descuentos especiales y trasladarlos a los precios de sus productos. Esta es la razón por la cual  en la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la  Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará una máquina plana que mejorará sus tiempos productivos, el acabado de sus productos y también invertirá en materias primas e insumos con los que elaborará diseños alusivos a la navidad, pues las familias desean ver los interiores de su hogar con motivos de la época más linda del año: “LA Navidad”
texts.en:
Isaura is 29 years old and lives in La Nieves neighborhood, in the city of Barranquilla.  She lives together with her husband and her two daughters who are 3 and 8 years old.  The idea for Isaura's business came about when a neighbor asked for her help in making dolls, sheets and curtains.  That is when she first learned the craft and started being paid for her work.  She later set up her own business without any technical training but simply making the most of her ability to look and re-create what she saw.  

Isaura's business goals are to acquire her own premises, create jobs for other people and train continuously until she manages to perfect her skills.  Her goals for her family are to offer her children a higher education and to provide her husband with even more help in covering their household expenses.  In her business, Isaura makes dolls, linens, sheets and curtains.  She sells these goods for cash from 8.00am until 5.00pm.  She pays for her purchases in cash and prefers to buy in bulk so that she can obtain special discounts which she can then apply to the price of her finished products.  

Isaura is requesting a Kiva loan (her first loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo) to buy a sewing machine which will improve her production time and the quality of the finishing on her products.  She will also invest in raw materials and supplies which she will use to bring to life her Christmas designs as families like to decorate their homes with decorations representing the most beautiful time of the year: Christmas.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and raw materials such as fabric, cotton and threads

loans.name: Tuychiboy

texts.ru: Туйчибою 22 года. Он не женат и живет с родителями. Он очень трудолюбивый и целеустремленный молодой человек. В 2008 году он поступил в Профессиональное Техническое Учреждение и окончил  с отличием в 2009 году. Он научился делать сварку и более 3 года он занимается услугой сварщика. Он делает ворота, заборы, печки и т.п. Такие услуги он преподносит в заказ. В течение месяца он берет 10-12 заказов. Полученный доход он  использует для семейного расхода. Его отец хочет уехать за границу, но не имеет денег для покупки авиабилета. Он попросил сына купить авиабилет. У Туйчибоя тоже нет сбережения для покупки авиабилета, и поэтому он обратился в нашу организацию для получения займа в сумме 1500 сомони для покупки авиабилета. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Tuychiboy is 22 years old. He is not married and lives with his parents. He is a very hardworking and dedicated young man. 

In 2008, he enrolled at the Technical Vocational Institution and graduated with honors in 2009. He learned how to weld and for more than three years he has been providing welding services. He makes gates, fences, furnaces, etc. He provides these services on order. In the course of a month, he takes 10-12 orders. He uses the income received for the family's expenses. 

His father wants to go abroad, but has no money to buy a plane ticket. He asked his son to buy a ticket. Tuychiboy also has no savings to buy a ticket, and so he turned to our organization for a loan of 1,500 Somoni to buy a plane ticket. He is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: To buy a plane ticket for his father

loans.name: Mahmadyusuf

texts.ru: Махмадюсуфу 45 лет. Он имеет большую семью. Его жена, очень добрая женщина и помогает ему в ведении бизнеса.  Махмадюсуф имеет на воспитании 7 детей. Из них двое совершеннолетние, а пятеро не совершеннолетние и учатся в средней школе. Более 24 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры, как картофель, пшеницу, лук и т.п. Данное время он собирается посеять на 0,5 га лук и на 0.30 га зерно. Полученный доход он продает на рынке. Так как у него высококачественный урожай, так и его товары имеют большой спрос. Его жена и старшие сын и дочь помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами он хочет развевать свой бизнес, а для этого он должен получить больше урожая. Он запрашивает займ на сумму  1000 сомони, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения. Полученный доход он будет использовать для улучшения условия проживания, а также для образования детей. Будущим у него много планов, которые требуют массу денег. Он является повторным клиентом и обещает погасить займ во время. Он нуждается и ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Mahmadyusuf is 45 years old and he has a large family.  His wife is a wonderful woman and she helps him with the business.  They have seven children.  Two of them are adults, the other five are studying in high school.  For more than 24 years he has been farming, growing crops such as potatoes, wheat, onions, etc.  At the present time, he is preparing to sow 0.5 hectares with onion, and 0.3 hectares with grain.  He will sell the harvest at the market, and as his harvests are of high quality, they enjoy a strong demand.  His wife, and eldest son and daughter help him with the business.  

With the goal of providing his family with all the necessities, he wants to develop his business, but to do this he needs a larger harvest.  He is requesting a loan of 1,000 somoni to buy mineral fertilizers.  He will use the profit to improve their living conditions as well as for the children's education.  He has many plans for the future and they require a lot of money.  He is a repeat client and promises to repay the loan on time.  He needs and awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es: Juan Francisco de 48 años de edad, soltero con dos hijos de 12, 15 años los cuales están estudiando. Él tiene por actividad económica  servicios de albañilerías. Tiene 13 años de tener el negocio el cual lo realiza de forma ambulante. La rutina de este hombre es trabajar por contrato ofreciendo sus servicios de albañilería a empresas y personas particulares. A través de los años ha tenido muy buena reputación con sus obras. El objetivo del préstamo es para comprar material de trabajo como: madera, cintas métricas, palas, niveles, escaleras, cucharas, carretas, mangueras. En la foto el cliente nos demustra parte del trabajo que realza para  ganarse la vida. Juan Francisco agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan  a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en: Juan Francisco is 48 years old, single, and has two children, ages 12 and 15 who attend school.  He works as a mason and has had this business for 13 years and works on contract for companies and private individuals.  Over the years he has earned a good reputation for his work .  His goal for this loan is to buy supplies, such as lumber, measuring tapes, shovels, levels, ladders, spoons, carts and hoses.  In the picture he is showing off some of the work he does to earn a living.  Juan Francisco is grateful for the help that the Kiva lenders provide to people of limited resources in poor countries like Nicaragua so they can have a dignified source of employment.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Abdunazar

texts.ru: Абдуназару 62 года, Он женат и на воспитании имеет 5 детей. Его жена Анорбиби очень хорошая домохозяйка. Его дети совершеннолетние. Более 22 года он занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры, особенно пшеницу. Каждый год он делает посев пшеницы на 0,5 га арендованной земли. Полученный доход он продает на рынке. На местном рынке пшеница имеет большой спрос. Поэтому он каждый год получает намеченный доход, который использует для содержания семьи. Его жена и дети помогают ему в ведении бизнеса. В этом году у него больше семейного расхода, что не позволило ему сберечь деньги для покупки минерального удобрения и семена для посева нового сезона. Он запрашивает займ на сумму  2000 сомони, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения и семена. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Abdunazar is 62 years old, married, and has five children.  His wife, Anorbibi, is an excellent homemaker.  His children are adults.  For more than 22 years he has been growing crops, primarily wheat.  Every year he sows wheat on 0.5 hectares of rented land and he sells the harvest at the market.  Wheat enjoys strong demand at the local market, and so every year he receives the income that he was planning on and he uses it to support his family.  His wife and children help him with the business.

This year the family had more expenses and Abdunazar wasn't able to save money for buying mineral fertilizers and seed for the next season.  He is requesting a loan of 2,000 somoni to buy mineral fertilizers and seed.  He is depending on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María de 39 años de edad, vive en un municipio muy cercano a la ciudad de Barranquilla con su cónyuge y sus 2 hijos de 15 y 3 años. Allí se dedica a la elaboración de postres, pudines, galletas, brownies y deditos de queso empacados en recipientes de icopar y cubiertos con un plástico especial para ello; negocio con el que genera ingresos que benefician a su hogar y que inició desde el año 2010, una vez realizó un curso, en el que aprendió la preparación de estos alimentos y un año después, decidió emprender sus propia aventura independiente, que poco a poco ha ido creciendo y consolidándose en su mercado doméstico. Sus ventas las realiza de contado, con una frecuencia semanal, desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche y vende sobre pedidos a vecinos, empresas que le encargan y pequeños negocios del sector, comprando a su vez, la materia prima a mayoristas de productos derivados de la harina de trigo,  quienes le ofrecen los mejores precios, los cuales traslada a su clientela y los mantiene felices y dispuestos a regresar a comprarle. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará harina de trigo insumos de repostería, pues desde Noviembre ya ha tomado pedidos de familias, que quieren celebrar con tortas, ponqués y  postres las fiestas del año nuevo y las navidades y que mejor que responderle a estos hogares, puede ocurrirle a María, quien con los productos elaborados por sus propias manos, deleitará el paladar  de quienes le compran y reparten con amor las deliciosos pudines, postres, ponqués, deditos, pastelitos etc. en estas lindas fiestas  y tradicionales fiestas decembrinas, en las que tambien aumentará su cobertura de clientes y aumentará sus ventas, para ganar un poco mas.
texts.en:
María is 29 years old and lives with her husband and two children, ages 15 and 3, in a town very near Barranquilla, where she makes desserts, pudding, cookies, brownies, and cheese straws, sealed in Icopar containers and covered with a special type of plastic.  She began this business in 2010 and it generates an income that benefits her household.  She had taken a course where she learned how to prepare these items and a year later decided to begin her own entrepreneurial venture.  Little by little she has been growing and consolidating her domestic market.
